scenes.description: A family relaxing in the living room with the sound of a TV in the background.
bubbles:
あ、そうだ！
掃除機かけなきゃ！

scenes.description: Character A takes out a new high-performance vacuum cleaner.
bubbles:
この新しい掃除機は
とっても強力だってさ！

scenes.description: Character A turns on the vacuum cleaner and starts cleaning the living room floor. The vacuum cleaner is sucking up dirt with incredible force.
bubbles:
すごいね！
こんなに綺麗に
なるなんて！

scenes.description: Character A gets carried away and uses the vacuum cleaner on furniture, curtains, and even the family's heads.
bubbles:
ちょっと！
髪まで
吸い取られちゃうよ！
